## FieldTemplateObject type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FieldTemplateObject = {
    id: string;
    model: 'fieldTemplate';
    name: string;
    type: 'text' | 'labels' | 'select' | 'date' | 'linkedTasks' | 'status';
    labelSets?: Array<{
        id: string;
        model: 'fieldLabelSet';
        value: string;
    }>;
    labels?: Array<{
        id: string;
        model: 'fieldLabel';
        value: string;
        hue: number;
        labelSetId?: string;
        statusState: 'default' | 'started' | 'blocked' | 'canceled' | 'completed';
    }>;
    archive: boolean;
};
```
